summary: ANTI-LOCK BRAKING SYSTEM. ABS SYSTEM ACTIVATES ON DRY PAVEMENT WHEN BRAKING IF A SLIGHT BUMP IS HIT.  UNABLE TO STOP VEHICLE SAFELY WHEN SYSTEM IS ACTIVATED.  ANTILOCK BRAKE SYSTEM WARNING LIGHT STAYS ON PERIODICALLY.
